customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and in good condition. The assembly took some imagination
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and in good condition. The assembly took some imagination, because the instructions did not match the parts list, i.e., some of the parts that the instructions said to assemble appeared to be missing, but closer inspection showed that some parts were pre-assembled before packing/shipping. I suspect many users would be confused by this, looking for "part A" to assemble to "part B" when no part A, as shown in the drawing, could not be found in the package. I finally discovered that it had already been installed into part B, for instance. Other than that, I have it put together, looks OK, but have not used it yet.

customer_reviews.title: Unstable

customer_reviews.title: Easy Shower Access
customer_reviews.text: The tub transfer bench is easy to assemble and adjustable for height and also for which end your shower faucet is located. I have a broken hip healing without surgery but am able to sit and slowly pivot and slide so that I have access to my shower. The bench is sturdy, especially when you are putting your weight on it. I recommend installing a handheld shower head since you can't turn around to rinse your back. I am very grateful for the transfer bench. It has helped in my recuperation.

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe

customer_reviews.title: Transfer bench assembly.
customer_reviews.text: The directions are not very good and it appeared that one of the brass pins was missing. However, on closer look inside the tube I discovered the pin and wire spring mechanism became dislodged and pushed down in the tube. I used a narrow screwdriver and pushed it into place. After that the assembly went smoothly. The company emailed me a response in a timely manner, but by that time, I had solved the problem. Pictures and directions could have been better, but with patience I figured the assembly out. The bench provides good support and safety
customer_reviews.author: Wendy P. DeFlorville

customer_reviews.title: Great design, very configurable, and assembly went pretty quickly

Also very adjustable in terms of height and seatback. My father has not had a chance to use it yet, but I expect this will greatly help out and provide an additional measure of safety.

feature_bullets: GET IN AND OUT SAFELY: Safely enter and exit the bathtub with confidence. The transfer bench supports up to 300 pounds and provides independence for seniors and for those with limited mobility.

QUICK AND EASY ASSEMBLY: The transfer bench comes partially assembled for a quick and easy installation in your bathroom. The final tool-free assembly takes ten minutes or less, much quicker than the competition.

REVERSIBLE DESIGN FOR ANY BATHROOM: Lightweight and durable, the arm and backrest are reversible to accommodate any tub or shower. The bench is 30.5” wide at the base and the dual column extension legs adjust to a maximum of 20” high for personal comfort. Corrosion-resistant, the frame and platform seat are easily cleaned with a standard disinfectant.

COMFORTABLE AND SECURE SEATING: Feel secure and stable with the non-skid, non-slip bench. Each outside leg is capped with a non-skid, non-slip tip for a safe and secure experience. Large suction cup caps on the interior legs ensures the bench does not slip or slide on the smooth tub surface. Providing additional comfort and security, the molded plastic seat contains 30 drainage holes to prevent the puddling of water on the seat.
VIVE LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Lifetime guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.
